summary:
Pound sterling (GBP) is the currency used in the United Kingdom and nine other British territories. It's one of the oldest and most important currencies in the world, often called just "pound." The Bank of England controls the money, but some other British places can also print their own pounds.

In 2022, it was the fourth most popular currency for trading worldwide. It's also held as a reserve currency by many countries, meaning it's like a savings account for international banks.
title: Pound sterling
